description: Try our easy to follow Okonomiyaki with Prawns recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Okonomiyaki with Prawns Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cm piece fresh ginger, finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk eggs in a large bowl. Sift flour and baking powder together and gradually whisk into egg. Stir mirin, sesame oil, 3 cups cabbage, two-thirds of the onion and ginger into batter until combined. Season. Cover and set aside for 20 minutes.
Combine remaining cabbage, radish and vinegar in a bowl. Set aside for 5 minutes to lightly pickle.

Preheat oven to 150Â°C. Heat 1 tbs vegetable oil in a 20cm non-stick frying pan over medium-low heat. Add quarter of the batter and cook for 2-3 minutes or until golden. Turn over and cook for a further 2 minutes or until cooked through. Transfer to a baking tray and keep warm in oven. Repeat with remaining batter, adding more oil as required, to make 4 pancakes.
Heat remaining oil in same pan over medium heat. Add prawns and cook for 1-2 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Add remaining onion and stir to combine.
Top pancakes with radish pickle and prawn mixture and fold in half. Drizzle over chilli sauce and serve with mayonnaise.
